ygData.subject: Hi I'm new
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello All, I have been playing for about 2 1/2 yrs on Bristlebane. I managed to force my hef rgr to lvl 18/19--18 is where I spend most of my time, but
ygData.messageBody:
Hello All,

I have been playing for about 2 1/2 yrs on Bristlebane. I managed to
force my hef rgr to lvl 18/19--18 is where I spend most of my time,
but sometimes I lvl to 19.

I have been recently been building my fletching skills(104). I spent
about 4hrs a day hunting in front of Qeynos killing green mobs for
about 3wks. All I make is about 150plat in the 4 hrs with no exp, but
when I go hunting elswere--like bb--I only get about 5 plat for 4 hrs
and some exp. I seem to go up about 2 skill points in that time in
front of Qeynos.

I don't mean to complain, but I am starting to feel sorry for all
knolls and gopher snakes I've killed. Plus I would like to be able to
do more quests.

I do want to earn everything myself, but would like to know where I
can earn some serious plat? I have heard of people lvl 12 earning 4-
5000 plat/hr.

How do they do that?

Anyone have any suggestions?

Thanks
